info.name: Userstyles - Dark n Flat
info.description:
I love userstyles! But I don't love the design! 
Just made a dark and flat design for the page to try and make it a little easier on the eyes when reading.
info.additionalInfo:
**NOT COMPATIBLE WITH USER STYLES NEWEST WEBSITE, UPDATE COMING SOON**

Attempting to make userstyles darker, flatter, and easier to read. Also working to make the site more responsive for various screen sizes. Please let me know if you have anything that you want fixed/edited or any requests. Email me at jon245@msn(dot)com

Still haven't touched a few pages.

v0.10 alpha - 12/30/16 - Mostly made edits to the style uploading page
v0.9 alpha - 12/28/16 - Less layers / flatter, and other minor tweaks
v0.8 alpha - 12/24/16 - More media queries and more forum work
v0.7 alpha - 12/23/16 - More media queries weeee
v0.6 alpha - 12/23/16 - Added initial support for forum pages, begin putting in some media queries to make the site more responsive on smaller screens
v0.5 alpha - First Release
